price: Dhugumatti, Muusaaf qajeelfama kenninee, Ilmaan Israa’iilis kitaaba dhaalchifne.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-hudā wa-awrathnā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba
